name: simple leather belt
description:
the simple leather belt, handmade to order in Denver, CO, USA.  this simple belt is only sold in solid colors. save the tacky designs or "all over" prints for your trash bags....just keep it simple.

available in literally any color (just choose the "custom" option and write in the comments section what color you desire for an extra $5).  

this belt is handmade from 7oz veg-tan leather sporting 2 snaps so you can change out belt buckles or just stick with the original.  

each belt comes with its own keeper in the same color as the belt and with the edges finished in black.

the standard size of he belt is 28" - 36"...so if you need one bigger, just email Hello@SimpleLeatherWallet.com and let us know...we can make a larger one for no extra charge (so dont stop eating those doughnuts).

Dimensions: 28" - 36" long, 1.5" wide

name: simple green clutch
description:
the simple leather clutch, designed by simple leather co.  this 9" wide x 5.5" tall x 2" wide clutch is designed to do exactly what you need it to do without adding too much bulk or unwanted floppy-ness.  

it's one pocket design can hold your wallet, makeup, accessories and anything else you may need for a night out on the town or for short trips where you only need a few things.

the main flap wraps around to form the design and 2 small natural tanned leather gussets form the sides.  the clasp is comprised of one rectangular piece of natural tanned leather with two small, black buttons to hold the clutch in place.

if you're looking for a small hand bag to compliment your outfit with a crisp, clean look, search no more.  the simple leather clutch is here to make your life simple without adding too much baggage.

name: front pocket wallet in honey
description:
the front pocket wallet, handmade to order in denver, co, usa.

this modern yet classy front pocket wallet is framed with a single piece of 3oz. veg-tan honey cowhide leather saddle stitched twice with black waxed linen for maximum strength. it also fashions a super slim design to get out of the way in almost any pocket scenario. if you're going out and only need to carry up to 10 cards and a little bit of cash, this works beautifully. 

one top pocket fits folded cash or up to 10 cards and one side pocket that fits folded cash

10 year warranty against broken stitching

dimensions: 4" x 2.5" x 1/8"

allow 3 days for fabrication

custom colorway requests are welcomed

name: simple leather wallet in raw
description:
the raw simple leather wallet in red, handmade to order in denver, co, usa.

three pockets, two stitches, one single piece of 3oz. veg-tan un-dyed cowhide leather. these wallets are designed with the utmost simplicity for a non-obtrusive, honest, classy and durable construction. 

it fashions a super slim design that allows you to move freely without being encumbered with unwanted bulk. the edges are raw and stitched in black. two card pockets that hold up to 10 cards each and one cash billfold large enough for all currencies.

10 year warranty against broken stitching.

dimensions: 4.5" x 3.125" x .25"

allow 3 days for fabrication

custom colors and requests are welcomed

name: simple leather wallet in honeymint
description:
the simple leather wallet, handmade to order in denver, co, usa.

three pockets, two stitches, one single piece of 3oz. veg-tan honey cowhide leather. these wallets are designed with the utmost simplicity for a non-obtrusive, honest, classy and durable construction. each wallet is treated before we ship it out so all you have to do when you receive it is fill it up with your cards, cash and head outside to enjoy the day or night.

it fashions a super slim design that allows you to move freely without being encumbered with unwanted bulk. the edges are finished in mint to match the mint stitching. two card pockets that hold up to 10 cards each and one cash billfold large enough for all currencies.

10 year warranty against broken stitching.

dimensions: 4.5" x 3.125" x .25"

allow 3 days for fabrication

custom colors and requests are welcomed

name: simple leather badge wallet
description:
the simple leather badge wallet, handmade to order in denver, co, usa.

three pockets, two stitches, one single piece of 3oz. veg-tan honey cowhide leather. these wallets are designed with the utmost simplicity for a non-obtrusive, honest, classy and durable construction. each wallet is treated before we ship it out so all you have to do when you receive it is fill it up with your cards, cash and head outside to enjoy the day or night.

it fashions a super slim design that allows you to move freely without being encumbered with unwanted bulk. the edges are finished in black to match the black stitching. two card pockets that hold up to 10 cards each, one cash billfold large enough for all currencies and two punched holes to accommodate a badge. great for firemen, sheriffs or law abiding citizens.

10 year warranty against broken stitching.

dimensions: 4.5" x 3.125" x .25"

allow 3 days for fabrication

custom colors and requests are welcomed

name: credit card wallet charcoal black/grey
description:
the new front pocket wallet, or credit card wallet, handmade to order in denver, co, usa.

this modern yet classy front pocket wallet is framed with a single piece of 3oz. veg-tan black dyed cowhide leather saddle stitched twice with grey waxed linen for maximum strength.  the rear pocket is cut on a bias for accessibility and lengthened 1/4" from our original design to allow cards in either of the two pockets. it also fashions a super slim design to get out of the way in almost any pocket scenario. if you're going out and only need to carry up to 10 cards and a little bit of cash, this works beautifully. 

one top pocket fits folded cash or up to 10 cards and one side pocket that fits folded cash

10 year warranty against broken stitching

dimensions: 4.25" x 2.5" x 1/8"

allow 7 days for fabrication

custom colorway requests are welcomed
